title: Basic
description: A very basic bot in one file, and a simple ping command
postinstall: The basic boilerplate is now installed. Please put your token in the .env file (see README for details) and run: node index.js

title: Argument Parser
description: A simple bot in one file with argument parsing and a prefix built-in
postinstall: The argument parser boilerplate is now installed. Please put your token in the .env file (see README for details) and run: node index.js

title: Command and Event Handler
description: A bot with commands and events in their own folder, ready to add your own
postinstall: The argument parser boilerplate is now installed. Please rename config.json.example to config.json, edit the token and prefix, and run: node index.js

title: GuideBot
description: The Official GuideBot Boilerplate with a few useful commands!

title: GuideBot Class
description: The Class-based version of the above, if you prefer classes.
